tag_list: ceo, vp, information-technology, rpo, sdo, off-shore, recruitment, management, training
overview:
Over 30 years in Information Technology with progressive growth and now CEO and Founder at Virtusso,LLC from November 2007. Strategic planning for RPO (Recruitment Process Outsourcing) to India from rest of the world, Consulting, including business & sales strategy development. To promote software development center in India. To promote RPO (Research Process Outsourcing) to India.

Served as Vice President at EC-Manage, Inc. Privately Held ; Information Technology and Software Services Provider. Strategic Consulting, including business plan & sales strategy development. Open new ofices in different countries. Set-up on-shore off-shore business model.
